name: Systematix Technocrates
tag_list: systematix-indore, web-development, ios-development, android-development, ror-development, django-development, ruby-on-rails-programmers, java-development, php-development, joomla-development, wordpress-development, cakephp-development, zend-development,
overview:
Systematix Technocrates is headquartered at Indore, India; is an IT software development company that delivers affordable solutions through software development. Mission is to develop network of strong alliances, to design product-based services and solutions that not only meet but also exceed the customer’s expectations where quality and time are always an essentiality.

Systematix Technocrates works in PHP (OOP, CakePhp, Zend, Codeigniter, and OpenSource CMSs such as Joomla, Wordpress, Magento, OsCommerce, Drupal, Opencart), Java (J2EE, Struts, Spring, Hibernate), Ruby on Rails (RoR), Django, iPhone and iPad (iOS) development, Android development.
